content: The Great Day of the Lord(A)
The word of the  which came to Zephaniah the son of Cushi, the son of Gedaliah, the son of Amariah, the son of Hezekiah, in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah.
The Great Day of the Lord
From the face of the land,”
I will consume the birds of the heavens,
And the stumbling blocks along with the wicked.
I will cut off man from the face of the land,”
